name: ChelseaFootballClubFactoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, open chelsea fact of the day”
”tell me a Chelsea fact”
”give me some Chelsea information”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chelsea fact of the day
des: A simple skill that provides the user with random interesting tidbits about Chelsea Football Club. Fans of Chelsea, like myself, would always like to hear about the proud history of the club, and the records that are being made every day by the club. Just ask Alexa to tell you a Chelsea fact for the day, and you should receive it!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
